bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shu lou 鼠瘺 , mouse fistula. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mao 貓：殺蟲治 疳及痘瘡變黑，瘰癧癙瘺惡瘡 , “It kills bugs/worms and cures gan -illness as well as smallpox sores that have turned black, scrofula with pervasion-illness, mouse-illness fistula , and malign sores”. Shu nai zhi 鼠奶痔 , mouse-nipple piles [1]

Pathological Condition identical with shu zhi 鼠痔 , mouse piles. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry pu huang 蒲黃：治 鼠奶痔：蒲黃末，空心温酒下方寸匕，日三 , “To cure mouse-nipple piles : Ingest one square-inch-size spoon full of pu huang powder with warm wine on an empty stomach three times a day”. Shu nue 暑瘧 , summerheat malaria [2]

Pathological Condition of nue ji 瘧疾 , malaria ailment, during summer with only minor sensations of cold and strong sensations of heat, or only of heat with no cold. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 115: 先 寒後熱名寒瘧 , 先熱後寒名温瘧 , 但熱不寒名暑瘧 , “If a cold sensation comes first and a heat sensation follows, this is called ‘cold malaria’. If a heat sensation comes first and a cold sensation follows, this is called ‘warmth malaria’. If there is only a heat sensation with no cold sensation, this is called ‘ summerheatmalaria ’”.
